document_data.name: ''Yawning Portal Dagger''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Yawning Portal daggers''''' were complimentary [[enchanted]] [[dagger]]s supplied to the guests who stayed at the [[Yawning Portal]] as of the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Most of the ''Yawning Portal daggers'' were masterfully crafted but dulled due to heavy use and time. Their hilts bore markings of the creator, a hidden [[wizard]]ly cabal from somewhere on the [[Sword Coast]].
document_data.Powers: Despite bearing a ''+2'' enchantment that guided the wielder's hand toward the target, ''Yawning Portal daggers'' were far from being deadly weapons, dealing less damage due to their dull blades.
document_data.History: As of the {{YearlinkName|1372}}, [[Durnan]], the proprietor of the Yawning Portal, supplied his guests with these enchanted daggers.
